text: Buddhashanti () is a rural municipality (gaunpalika) out of seven rural municipality located in Jhapa District of Koshi Province of Nepal. There are a total of 15 municipalities in Jhapa in which 8 are urban and 7 are rural. Buddhashanti, according to Ministry of Federal Affairs and Local Development has an area of and the total population of the municipality is 41,615 as of Census of Nepal 2011. == Related pages== * List of mayors of municipalities in Koshi Province * List of chairpersons of rural municipalities in Koshi Province == References== Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Buddhashanti Rural Municipality
